item.description:
Cambridge SEO Group meets the first monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.


Agenda:

6:45pm to 7pm: Get Your Food/Drinks and Network

7pm: Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?
* Share something interesting that happened to you during the Holidays. What's the most random gift that you were given or gave?

7:30pm to 8:00pm: Guest Speaker

Nick Stamoulis
Owner
http://www.brickmarke...

Blog's
SEO
http://www.searchengi...
Blog Marketing
http://blogmarketingj...

Discussion:
Integrated Marketing

How to integrate your overall marketing campaign with SEO. So that your not putting all your eggs in one basket


7:45 to 8:15pm:

Open Roundtable Topic Discussion.

8:15 to 8:30pm Best Websites & Tools: Share your urls & Whats Working? Group Discussion to share success stories of what else is working?

8:30 to 8:45pm: Share Your SEO Tips: Please post within your rsvp your url and then please take the time to review other sites listed prior to the meeting and write out your seo tips to exchange with fellow members.

8:45 to 9:00 pm: Open Roundtable Challenge Discussion: Please be specific about your challenges in your business or website. 3 to 5 min max spent on any one business model.


We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization January Meetup
